plot: Beth is having an affair with her husband Jack's boss, Duncan. When Duncan rejects her, Beth tricks Jack into taking revenge. Who is betraying who?
title: When the Eye Winks at the Hand
plot_es: Beth is having an affair with her husband Jack's boss, Duncan. When Duncan rejects her, Beth tricks Jack into taking revenge. Who is betraying who?
original_name: When the Eye Winks at the Hand
plot_en: Beth is having an affair with her husband Jack's boss, Duncan. When Duncan rejects her, Beth tricks Jack into taking revenge. Who is betraying who?
